_sText:
HERE IS THE 2ND BETA CALLED ze_JurassicPark_Escape_b2

Added/New Features:
* HAVE ADDED TREX COMPLETE WITH ANIMATIONS AND HUNGER!
* extended the the map for longer round time
* a few more custom textures
* added server command for helicopter "***heli inbound***"
* added water fall effects
* added sign instead of rock. like in jurassicpark_v2 by butterknife
* Changed water texture

IF YOU UPLOADED OLD THE OLD VERSION OF THE MAP TO YOUR SERVER PLEASE UPDATE ASAP
NOBLOCK ON!! & NO HIGHJUMPING ZOMBIES

Fixes:
* no longer get stuck in the truck
* wipe out gas now comes in more quickly
* no longer able to get under the map
* low FPS at spawn
* now unable to get stuck under rock in swanp
* gate will stay open an exra 5 seconds
* no longer lag when going up 1 of the planks
* harder to stop zombies from reaching the loading bay (no camping bitches)
* swump jump now harder to make but still pretty easy
* fixed breakable concrete giving wooden gibs

* i made this map becasue of the loss of butterknifes jurassic park. the fix realsed did not realy work to well therefore i have realsed this map instead. has many of the great features from his version now in mine. please not that this is my first zombie escape map EVER!

* please check out the jurassic-life mod for halflife 2
www.jurassic-life.game-lab.com/

* Report bugs to by youtube channel thegregster101

What the hell people. disaporved x3 HA!
credit theft? please can somone tell me what the hell this is!
